subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: John Mara, the Giants’ co-owner, weathered the N.F.L. lockout along with his team’s ups and downs, including calls to fire his coach, and was rewarded with a trip to the Super Bowl.
snippet: John Mara, the Giants’ co-owner, weathered the N.F.L. lockout along with his team’s ups and downs, including calls to fire his coach, and was rewarded with a trip to the Super Bowl.
